cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 10 miles WSW of Cape Hatteras, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: accelerating northeastward just offshore of the Mid-Atlantic states toward extreme SE New England then Nova Scotia

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch from Prince Edward Island and portions of New Brunswick/Newfoundland (see advisory)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from NC/VA border to Fenwick Island DE, parts of Chesapeake Bay & Tidal Potomac; Hurricane Warning Surf City NC to NC/VA border
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Mid-Atlantic coast, extreme SE New England, Canadian Maritimes
weather_observation.wind: Low (≤4%) chance of brief tropical-storm-force gusts Friday night into early Saturday; otherwise breezy 20–30 mph winds possible.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected along New York–New Jersey harbor given offshore track.
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rain bands may drop 1–2 inches of rain Friday night into Saturday morning.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf and rip currents along the New Jersey and Long Island beaches through the weekend.
